Encoding.HelpMesg: Use this menu to open an item in the Apple Menu Items folder or to display the DocSkeleton about box.
Displays the DocSkeleton version number and a copyright notice.
Use this menu to close windows or quit.
Creates a new untitled document window.
Opens a saved DocSkeleton document.
Closes the frontmost window.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Closes the frontmost window. Disabled because there are no windows.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Saves the frontmost document window.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Saves the frontmost document window. Not available because the document hasn't been changed or there are no document windows.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Saves the frontmost document window under a new name.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Saves the frontmost document window under a new name. Not available because there are no document windows.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Removes any changes you've made to the document since saving it.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Removes any changes you've made to the document since saving it. Not available because the document hasn't been saved or changed.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Quits DocSkeleton.
Use this menu to undo/redo actions or to perform editing operations.
Reverses your last action.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Reverses your last action. Disabled because you haven't done anything that can be undone.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Re-performs your last action after it has been undone.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Re-performs your last action after it has been undone. Disabled because you haven't selected Undo yet.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Copies the selection to the clipboard and deletes the selection.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Copies the selection to the clipboard and deletes the selection. Not available because there isn't anything that can be selected.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Copies the selection to the clipboard.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Copies the selection to the clipboard. Not available because there isn't a selection.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Replaces the selection with the contents of the clipboard.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Replaces the selection with the contents of the clipboard. Not available because there is no selection.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Deletes the selection.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Deletes the selection. Not available because there is no selection.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Selects everything.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Selects everything. Not available because everything is already selected or there isn't a window with selectable content.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Use this menu to change the parameters that affect the way DocSkeleton draws.
Changes the width of the stroke around the rectangles.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Changes the width of the stroke around the rectangles. Not available because there isn't a window.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Pops up a system color picker for the rectangle's fill color.
Encoding.DisabledHelp: Pops up a system color picker for the rectangle's fill color. Not available because there isn't a window.

Encoding.HelpMesg: Misc debugging tools.
